com.nokia.maps.component.ui

Class BackgroundBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.component.ui.BackgroundBox

  • public class BackgroundBox
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the background of a UI Item.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_BORDER_WIDTH
      This constant defines a default border width in pixels.
      static int NO_FILL
      This constant defines a UI item with no background.
      static int SMALL_CORNER_ARC
      This constant defines the size of a small corner arc in pixels
      static int TEXT_MARGIN
      This constant defines a margin around text buttons in pixels.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BackgroundBox(int borderColor, int highlightColor, int background, int highlightBackground)
      This method instantiates a new instance of a Background object with some standard default styling.
      BackgroundBox(int border, int margin, int borderColor, int highlightborder, int background, int highlightBackground)
      This method instantiates a new instance of a Background object with the various inputs defining the style of the background.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BackgroundBox

        public BackgroundBox(int border,
             int margin,
             int borderColor,
             int highlightborder,
             int background,
             int highlightBackground)
        This method instantiates a new instance of a Background object with the various inputs defining the style of the background.
        Parameters:
        border - border width in pixels
        margin - margin in pixels
        borderColor - RGB border color
        highlightborder - RGB highlight color
        background - RGB background color
        highlightBackground - RGB background highlight color

      • BackgroundBox

        public BackgroundBox(int borderColor,
             int highlightColor,
             int background,
             int highlightBackground)
        This method instantiates a new instance of a Background object with some standard default styling.
        Parameters:
        borderColor - RGB border color
        highlightColor - RGB border highlight color
        background - RGB background color
        highlightBackground - RGB backgroudn highlight color.

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        public void paint(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g)
        This method renders the background box of the current UI item if defined.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics object used for rendering

      • setAnchor

        public void setAnchor(int x,
             int y,
             int height,
             int width)
        This method sets up the background for display
        Parameters:
        x - x axis pixel coordinate of the top left corner of the background
        y - y axis pixel coordinate of the top left corner of the background
        height - height of the background in pixels
        width - width of the background in pixels

      • getAnchor

        public Point getAnchor()
        This method retrieves the anchor point
        Returns:
        An object containing the x and y pixels of the top left corner of the background on the screen display.

      • isHighlight

        public boolean isHighlight()
        This method retrieves a boolean value indicating whether the background should be highlighted or not.
        Returns:
        true if the background should be highlighted or false otherwise.

      • setHighlight

        public void setHighlight(boolean highlight)
        This method sets a boolean value indicating whether the background should be highlighted or not.
        Parameters:
        highlight - Whether the background should be highlighted or not.

      • getBorderAndMargin

        public int getBorderAndMargin()
        This method retrieves the calculated value of borders and margins.
        Returns:
        The value in pixels of the border of the background box including the margin.

      • getBorderColor

        public int getBorderColor()
        This method retrieves the border color
        Returns:
        The border color as a RGB value

      • getHighlightColor

        public int getHighlightColor()
        This method retrieves the border highlight color
        Returns:
        The border highlight color as a RGB value

      • getHighlightBackground

        public int getHighlightBackground()
        This method retrieves the background highlight color
        Returns:
        The background highlight color as a RGB value
